attributes.action: Kindly stop treating the Foreign students as criminals as NOT ALL of us are here to earn money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to humbly request the Hon Prime Minister to kindly ask the Home Office and the respectable Home Secretary to stop targeting and treating all the foreign students as criminals.
A few bad apples have given a bad name to the whole bunch. Its unfair to target  and use us as guinea pigs in any new policy implemented by the Govt.
Most of us are here to study and the people who aren't shouldn't be given the visas to come here in the first place.
Thanx

rejection.details: Your petition does not make a point about government policy. Please rewrite and submit again.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
